text: Krapopolis is an American animated sitcom. It was created by Dan Harmon for the Fox Broadcasting Company. It premiered on September 24, 2023, on the Animation Domination programming block. Set in mythical Ancient Greece, the series centers on a flawed family of humans, gods and monsters that tries to run one of the world's first cities without killing each other. title: Krapopolis
